Regulation Name(s): CFTR (cystic fibrosis transmembrane conductance regulator) gene mutation detection system
Instrument for Clinical Multiplex Test Systems
Analyte(s): CFTR gene mutations and variants (including mutations/variants recommended by 2004 ACMG and 2005 ACOG)
Specimen Type(s): Genomic DNA from human peripheral whole blood
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the eSensor® CF Genotyping Test and eSensor® XT-8 Instrument for multiplex qualitative genotyping of CFTR gene mutations in DNA from whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Simultaneous detection and identification of mutations and variants in the CFTR gene from genomic DNA isolated from human peripheral whole blood, for cystic fibrosis carrier screening, newborn screening, and confirmatory diagnostic testing in newborns and children, not for fetal or pre-implantation testing; results to be used with other laboratory and clinical information.
